content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(md, "\n\n")  # Split by double blank line
    extracted_code = join(lines[2:end]], "\n")  # Remove first line (header) and join the remaining code

    return extracted_code
end
```

This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document (`md`) as input. It splits the Markdown into sections using double blank lines. Then it removes the first section (which is likely the header), and joins the remaining code blocks together with a newline.

The final extracted Julia code string is returned by the function.
